comments.creator: marco.zehe@gmail.com
comments.text:
STR:
1. Go to http://oaa-accessibility.org/example/19/ and tab into the grid.
2. Arrow around.

Expected: newly focused cell should be spoken by NVDA.
Actual: No speech.
comments.author: marco.zehe@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
STR:
1. Go to http://oaa-accessibility.org/example/19/ and tab into the grid.
2. Arrow around.

Expected: newly focused cell should be spoken by NVDA.
Actual: No speech.

I can't tab into the grid, but I can arrow down into grid, first grid cell is announced by NVDA, and then virtual cursor gets broken (it doesn't move anywhere and page is scrolled instead). I can use JAWS to navigate whole documents successfully.

Jamie, can you look at example?
comments.author: surkov.alexander@gmail.com
comments.text:
